TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdvancedFilters extends System.Object

summary.span: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

span.span: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別從存取物件傳遞屬性，並有效地視為屬性物件，並不想要使用它自己。The class is accessed from a object through the property, and is effectually treated like a property of the object, and isn't intended to be used on its own. ## Examples 請參閱[依例查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)主題，例如程式碼。See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取應用程式應該透過使用者物件的屬性。Applications should access through the property of the user object.
